element.name: Tsuno
element.description:
Tsuno
TTucked away high into the mountains in the south of Dyax lie the Tsunno people. a hearty and rarely seen in most civilized places this hybrid race stays on the fringes of society. Ability Score Increase.Your Charisma increases by 1, your Strength score increases by 1 and you Constitution increases by 1.
Age.Tsuno reach maturity around the age of 25 and live for about 300 years.
AlignmentThe Tsuno mostly tend towards more Lawful alignments, but are rarely ever evil.
Size.Tsuno stand at about six to eight feet tall, but usually somewhere in the middle. They have large, muscular bodies around 190 to 330 pounds. Your size is Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision.Tsuno have received Darkvision from their infernal heritage. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Sturdy Stature. You have proficiency in the Athletics skill, and you count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.
